name: Body Worship
description: Come let us raise your spirit and improve your physical confidence through movement and dance-based exercise! This class consists of a 55-minute warm up and cardio-based work out that will strengthen our core and increase flexibility as well as develop our technique and 30 minutes of choreography that draws from an eclectic array of styles from Jazz and Contemporary to Voguing and Hip-Hop. The goal is to end every class feeling sassy and full of self-love.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
